trans-unit.source: Defines the interface for extending properties to other components in a container.
trans-unit.target: 定義擴充屬性，以在容器中的其他元件的介面。

trans-unit.source: An extender provider is a component that provides properties to other components.
trans-unit.target: 擴充性提供者是提供內容給其他元件的元件。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> control is an extender provider.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>控制項是擴充性提供者。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: When you add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> control to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, all other controls on the form have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> property added to their list of properties.
trans-unit.target: 當您將加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>控制權傳輸至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，所有其他控制項會在表單上的有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>屬性新增至它們的屬性清單。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: Any component that provides extender properties must implement IExtenderProvider.
trans-unit.target: 提供擴充項屬性的任何元件必須實作 IExtenderProvider。

trans-unit.source: A visual designer can then call <xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider.CanExtend%2A> to determine which objects in a container should receive the extender properties.
trans-unit.target: 視覺化設計工具就可以呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider.CanExtend%2A>來判斷哪一個容器中的物件應該接收擴充項屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider.CanExtend%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about extender providers, see [How to: Implement an Extender Provider](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需擴充性提供者的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 實作擴充性提供者](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether this object can provide its extender properties to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 指定此物件是否可以提供其擴充項屬性，以指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on extender properties, see [How to: Implement an Extender Provider](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關擴充項屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 實作擴充性提供者](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to receive the extender properties.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this object can provide extender properties to the specified object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這個物件可以擴充項屬性提供給指定的物件，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
